item.description:
Celebrity DJ Nawed at Hoja Rangela Re (Holi 2010 USA Tour)

tickets are priced - $15,$20 and $25

GenerationDesi.com is back again bringing you one of Boston's
hottest Bollywood/Bhangra party! You don't want to miss this!
From the people who bought you Glitz & Glamor earlier this year
and brought you DJ Akbar Sami in 2008! No imitators!!

We are bringing in Celebrity DJ Nawed from Mumbai to rock
Boston for One Night Only as part of his Holi 2010 U.S.A tour!
Deejay \\ Producer, Nawed has done the official remixes for
such films as: Jail, Golmaal Returns, Om Shanti Om, Billu
Barber & more! Shahrukh Khan's favorite DJ is here for you!

He has played in some of the top clubs in Goa . Mumbai. Chennai
. Bangalore. Calcutta . Pune . Delhi . Bahrain . Dubai . Kenya
. Hong Kong . South Africa . Indonesia. And now we bring him
to you in Boston!
<p>
More Info & Tickets:

http://cities.sulekha...

</p>
item.name: Lets go dancing! Next Saturday!! Celeb DJ Nawed in town!
